channel.title: Techmeme
channel.description: Top news and commentary for technology's leaders, from all around the web

item.title: As US schools adopt AI, a look at the growing use of AI-powered monitoring tools like GoGuardian to scan students' chatbot conversations for signs of self-harm (Janne Knodler/Bloomberg)
item.description:
Janne Knodler / Bloomberg:
As US schools adopt AI, a look at the growing use of AI-powered monitoring tools like GoGuardian to scan students' chatbot conversations for signs of self-harm  —  As US educators embrace AI in the classroom, firms are selling software to flag mentions of self-harm, raising concerns over privacy and control.

item.title: Chinese robotaxi companies' tech and rider experience are generally similar to Waymo's, as they build businesses at home while also expanding internationally (Peter Landers/Wall Street Journal)
item.description:
Peter Landers / Wall Street Journal:
Chinese robotaxi companies' tech and rider experience are generally similar to Waymo's, as they build businesses at home while also expanding internationally  —  While U.S. companies dominate their home market, other countries look to China for driverless technology

item.title: Several of Asia's top tycoons and conglomerates are joining the data center race as tech giants plan $240B in APAC hyperscale expansion over the next five years (Jonathan Burgos/Forbes)
item.description:
Jonathan Burgos / Forbes:
Several of Asia's top tycoons and conglomerates are joining the data center race as tech giants plan $240B in APAC hyperscale expansion over the next five years  —  The buildout of AI infrastructure in the Asia-Pacific is in high gear.  Masayoshi Son and Mukesh Ambani are among the region's wealthiest taking the lead.

item.title: A look at Dominari Holdings and Yorkville Advisors, two little-known boutique banks that have helped finance the Trump family's flurry of crypto deals this year (George Steer/Financial Times)
item.description:
George Steer / Financial Times:
A look at Dominari Holdings and Yorkville Advisors, two little-known boutique banks that have helped finance the Trump family's flurry of crypto deals this year  —  Dominari Holdings and Yorkville Advisors are benefiting from close connections with Eric and Donald Trump Jr

item.title: OpenAI, Alphabet, and Perplexity offering free access to their paid tiers in India suggests the country may be the biggest and safest bet for broad AI adoption (Mihir Sharma/Bloomberg)
item.description:
Mihir Sharma / Bloomberg:
OpenAI, Alphabet, and Perplexity offering free access to their paid tiers in India suggests the country may be the biggest and safest bet for broad AI adoption  —  Everyone is looking for the next big AI bet.  They're searching for energy-rich places that can run data centers cheaply …

item.title: Apple Music's growth may be stymied by the lack of a free tier as a funnel; Midia: on a weekly level, 43% of consumers used Spotify and 16% turned to Apple (Ashley Carman/Bloomberg)
item.description:
Ashley Carman / Bloomberg:
Apple Music's growth may be stymied by the lack of a free tier as a funnel; Midia: on a weekly level, 43% of consumers used Spotify and 16% turned to Apple  —  The service's lack of a free tier might be dimming its prospects with music consumers, particularly in emerging markets  —  Welcome back to Soundbite.

item.title: An account of working at Cursor for 60 days: a largely in-person culture, few scheduled meetings, aggressive recruiting, heavy internal product testing, more (Brie Wolfson/Colossus)
item.description:
Brie Wolfson / Colossus:
An account of working at Cursor for 60 days: a largely in-person culture, few scheduled meetings, aggressive recruiting, heavy internal product testing, more  —  Sixty days with the AI coding decacorn  —  Editor's note: This is the first installment in a series of Company Dispatches …

item.title: In DeepSeek's first public appearance since R1's success, a senior researcher told a state-run conference he was pessimistic about AI's impact on humanity (Reuters)
item.description:
Reuters:
In DeepSeek's first public appearance since R1's success, a senior researcher told a state-run conference he was pessimistic about AI's impact on humanity  —  - DeepSeek makes first public appearance in almost a year  — Company has kept low profile since global breakout in January

item.title: CoinGecko: crypto market cap falls to $3.5T from October's $4.4T peak, on track to erase its 2025 gains; crypto ETFs had $700M of net outflow over the past week (Bloomberg)
item.description:
Bloomberg:
CoinGecko: crypto market cap falls to $3.5T from October's $4.4T peak, on track to erase its 2025 gains; crypto ETFs had $700M of net outflow over the past week  —  The stock market didn't crash this week.  But after a seven-month spasm of retail-borne speculation, parts of the casino started clearing out.

item.title: Vast Data, which develops data storage tools, inks a $1.17B AI deal with CoreWeave; Vast Data, valued at $9.1B in 2023, said it reached $200M ARR by Jan. 2025 (Krystal Hu/Reuters)
item.description:
Krystal Hu / Reuters:
Vast Data, which develops data storage tools, inks a $1.17B AI deal with CoreWeave; Vast Data, valued at $9.1B in 2023, said it reached $200M ARR by Jan. 2025  —  - CoreWeave to use Vast's data storage tools for cloud infrastructure  — Vast Data's revenue stream bolstered by new deal

item.title: Nasdaq had its worst 5-day run since April, falling 3% for the week as the combined market value of eight most valuable AI-related stocks fell by about $800B (Financial Times)
item.description:
Financial Times:
Nasdaq had its worst 5-day run since April, falling 3% for the week as the combined market value of eight most valuable AI-related stocks fell by about $800B  —  Nasdaq falls 3% over the five-day period as investors worry about sky-high valuations  —  US companies closely tied …

item.title: A US judge declares a mistrial after a jury couldn't reach a verdict on two brothers charged in 2024 for allegedly stealing $25M in crypto from Ethereum traders (Bloomberg)
item.description:
Bloomberg:
A US judge declares a mistrial after a jury couldn't reach a verdict on two brothers charged in 2024 for allegedly stealing $25M in crypto from Ethereum traders  —  A jury was unable to reach a verdict in the fraud trial of two brothers, both recently graduated from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology …

item.title: Google introduces Nested Learning, a new ML approach for continual learning that views models as nested optimization problems to enhance long context processing (Google Research)
item.description:
Google Research:
Google introduces Nested Learning, a new ML approach for continual learning that views models as nested optimization problems to enhance long context processing  —  Ali Behrouz, Student Researcher, and Vahab Mirrokni, VP and Google Fellow, Google Research  —  We introduce Nested Learning …

item.title: Sources: Samsung is in talks with Barclays to launch a consumer credit card in the US; it's also exploring a high-yield savings account, BNPL product, and more (AnnaMaria Andriotis/Wall Street Journal)
item.description:
AnnaMaria Andriotis / Wall Street Journal:
Sources: Samsung is in talks with Barclays to launch a consumer credit card in the US; it's also exploring a high-yield savings account, BNPL product, and more  —  South Korean tech giant and Barclays are in advanced talks to launch a credit card, with both seeking bigger inroads into Americans' financial lives

item.title: France's Finance Ministry halts the suspension proceedings of Shein that was initiated on November 5 after Shein withdrew illicit products from its platform (Inti Landauro/Reuters)
item.description:
Inti Landauro / Reuters:
France's Finance Ministry halts the suspension proceedings of Shein that was initiated on November 5 after Shein withdrew illicit products from its platform  —  The French Finance Ministry on Friday halted the suspension proceedings of Chinese online retailer Shein initiated two days ago …
